manager_agent.name: Financial Insights Coordinator
manager_agent.description: Orchestrates sub-agents to aggregate financial data from autopays, subscriptions, investments, and expenses into unified dashboard insights and proactive alerts

sub_agents.name: Autopay Monitor Agent
sub_agents.description: Tracks upcoming autopay schedules, analyzes payment patterns, and flags unusual amounts or timing changes

sub_agents.name: Subscription Tracker Agent
sub_agents.description: Monitors active subscriptions, identifies unused services, calculates monthly subscription burn, and detects price changes

sub_agents.name: Investment Portfolio Agent
sub_agents.description: Fetches real-time portfolio values, calculates gains/losses, and summarizes investment performance across accounts

sub_agents.name: Shared Expense Analyzer Agent
sub_agents.description: Aggregates group expenses, calculates individual balances, and identifies pending settlements across expense groups

independent_agents.name: Payment Action Agent
independent_agents.description: Processes user-approved autopay actions including approve, delay, or cancel requests and confirms execution status

independent_agents.name: Subscription Control Agent
independent_agents.description: Executes subscription management actions including freeze, cancel, or modify subscription status based on user commands

independent_agents.name: Expense Settlement Agent
independent_agents.description: Calculates optimal settlement routes between group members and initiates payment requests or transfers for settling balances
